# smsService

**Instance Property**

The Short Message Service (SMS) service associated with this session.

## Declaration

```swift
final var smsService: SMSService { get }
```

## Using Short Message Service (SMS)

- **SMSService**: A class that provides an interface for performing SMS operations.
